General.Name: Qingdao Liqun Department Store Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Liqun Commercial Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the commercial retail chain business in China. It operates department stores, supermarkets, convenience stores, and electrical appliances stores. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Liqun Department Store Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Liqun Commercial Group Co.,Ltd. in January 2018. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Qingdao, China.

0.Name: Ms. Ruize  Xu
